entry.title: swastikroyyy/image-cropper-react: A lightweight, customizable React component for cropping images with drag, resize, and keyboard support. Supports exporting cropped images as **Base64**, **Blob**, or **File** — with options for **square** or **circle** crop boxes.
entry.content: A lightweight, customizable React component for cropping images with drag, resize, and keyboard support. Supports exporting cropped images as **Base64**, **Blob**, or **File** — with options for **square** or **circle** crop boxes.

entry.title: letmaker/liko: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript. Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI. Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.
